name: Opal Therapeutics
description: We provide a "Uterus in a Dish" platform, integrating uterine organoid models and AI analysis to accelerate the discovery and development of efficacious therapeutics and products to improve women's health.
one_liner: We provide a "Uterus in a Dish" platform, integrating uterine organoid models and AI analysis to accelerate the discovery and development of efficacious therapeutics and products to improve women's health.
